title: IP - Journalism
description: Journalists play a crucial role in shaping the narrative, from exposing corruption to championing human rights, providing context and analysis that influence public discourse

title: IP - Photography
description: Photographers capture pivotal moments, revealing truths and preserving history. Each photograph tells a story, ensuring significant events are seen, remembered, and understood.

title: All India Political Parties Meet

description: AGENDA: Socio-economic deprivation and persecution of refugees
